mudal panath kihipayak pilibanda parlimenthuwe di pawathi wiwadayata sahabhagi wima sandaha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha eeye (22) parlimenthuwata paminiye ya.janadhipathithuman mudal amathiwaraya washayen parlimenthuwe di eeye pawathi badu (sanshodhana) panath pilibanda wiwadayata sahabhagi wiya.

demala kongrasaye (ewakata) nayaka dhuraya hebawu ji.ji. ponnambalam, sulu jathinta ha maha jathiyata 50%-50% anupathayata ayithiwasikam labadiya yuthu waga puna puna pawasu awasthawe, sinhala maha jathiyata wadipura ayithin himiwiya yuthuyayi prasiddhiye kiya sitiye aacharya ti.bi. jaya, shrimath rasik faring, aacharya em.si.em. kalil saha aacharya badiuddin mohemang wani muslim nayakayanya.
bhikshu kathikawath liyapadinchi kirime panatha nawatha gena eemata sudanam wana bawa dana gannata labi thibenawa.
ee nisa dakunu aprikawe athdakim pilibanda salaka balime di sahajiwanaya athi kirime padanama wanne sathyaya handunaganima bawayi seni kiwindiya pawasanne.

maithripala sirisena janadhipathiwaraya eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye sithawakapura nagarasabhawe ha pradeshiya sabhawe apekshakayinge jayagrahanaya wenuwen pawathi janaraliyak amathamin kosgamadi "deshapalanagnyayin athara sitina dushithayin wanchakarayin horun siyalu dena awichi maha narakadiyata giyadata pasuwada mama gedara yanawa, samaharu magen ahanawa me putuwen bahala mama gedara yanne kawadda kiyala mema meke hamadama inna aawe naha namuth gedara yanne deshapalagnyayin athara sitina horun, dushithayan, wanchakaruwan siyalu dena hiragedarata yawwata passe owun siyalu dena polowa palagena awichi maha narakadiyata giyadata pahuwada mama gedara yanawa.
